statements: DELETE FROM support_tickets WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe' AND status = 'open';
DELETE FROM tickets WHERE ticket_id = 1 AND status = 'open';
DELETE FROM inquiries WHERE customer_id = 5 AND resolved = FALSE;
DELETE FROM tickets WHERE customer_id = (SELECT customer_id FROM inquiries WHERE resolved = TRUE);
DELETE FROM support_tickets WHERE ticket_id = 1001 AND status = 'Closed';
DELETE FROM support_tickets WHERE status = 'Open' AND created_at < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM ticket_comments WHERE comment_author = 'John Doe' AND created_at < '2022-02-01';
DELETE FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 2001 AND name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM interactions WHERE customer_id = 2002 OR agent_id = 3001;
DELETE FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 100 AND customer_email = 'example@example.com';
